summary: Planning and acting early can lead to better outcomes, as being proactive allows individuals to secure the best opportunities before they diminish.
Arriving early provides a strategic advantage, ensuring access to the highest quality options before they become scarce or less desirable.
Putting in the effort to act promptly and decisively can result in greater satisfaction and success, as seen in the ability to obtain superior goods.
Being resourceful and taking initiative can lead to optimal results, highlighting the benefits of seizing opportunities when they first arise.
